Name: VR Jurassic Escape
About the game: Welcome to the Dinosaur Island. There are thousands of various dinosaurs living in this beautiful and mysterious island. There are Tyrannosaurus that dominates the land, the pterosaurs flying in the sky, and the triceratops, stegosaurus and so on. When you get close to the dinosaurs, you will be found and killed. So you have to find a way to avoid all dinosaurs and escape from this dinosaur island. There is a magical teleportation stone gate, which can be helpful with your escape. So Find it! Enjoy your adventure! Instructions: Using the Trackpad from the right controller to control your movements. Using the Touchpad and the Trigger from the left controller to choose menu.
